title: Art Walk 2019
hero_caption: William Engdahl. Skyline, Lake Shore Drive (detail), 1952, printed 1983. Prince Foundation Fund.
list_description: Explore three of Chicago's finest private art collections.
description:
The Sustaining Fellows of the Art Institute of Chicago are cordially invited to Art Walk 2019 featuring visits to Joan and Robert Clifford's impressive collection of historic Chicago art; Marilyn and Larry Fields's extensive array of international contemporary art; and Judi Male and Irving Stenn's home filled with masterworks of minimalism. 

This program is sold out. This event is only for current Sustaining Fellows.

Flat, comfortable walking shoes are recommended. Shoe covers will be provided.

Event Details

The Casino Club
195 East Delaware Place

4:00—Registration
4:30–6:30—Tours
6:30–7:15—Cocktails
7:30—Seated Dinner

Event Co-Chairs: Valerie Carberry and Suzanne T. King
